First, I'd like to apologize to Talon for forgetting all about Blazer. Sorry, 
Talon!

Now on with the post:

::Blazer::

Blazer awakens in his quarters. He had been a bit tired, and had taken a 
short nap. The Predacon scientist exits his quarters, activating his 
comm-link.

"Sky Knight," he says into it, "Anything new with Berserk?"
